<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

function formatSeconds(value) { 
var theTime = parseInt(value);// Áßí 
var theTime1 = 0;// ÂàÜ 
var theTime2 = 0;// Â∞èÊó∂ 
if(theTime > 60) { 
theTime1 = parseInt(theTime/60); 
theTime = parseInt(theTime%60); 
if(theTime1 > 60) { 
theTime2 = parseInt(theTime1/60); 
theTime1 = parseInt(theTime1%60); } } 
var result = ""+parseInt(theTime)+"Áßí";

result = ""+parseInt(theTime1)+"ÂàÜ"+result; } 
if(theTime2 > 0) { 
result = ""+parseInt(theTime2)+"Â∞èÊó∂"+result; } 
return result; } 
if(jm.length>1){

var javaImport = new JavaImporter();

    Packages.java.io,

);
with(javaImport) {

        decode = Base64.getDecoder().decode(String(content));

                read = gZIPInputStream.read(bArr);
                if (read > 0) {
                    byteArrayOutputStream.write(bArr, 0, read);
                } else {
                    gZIPInputStream.close();
                    byteArrayInputStream.close();
                    byteArrayOutputStream.close();
                    return byteArrayOutputStream.toString();
                }
          }
    }
}

decode(java.aesBase64DecodeToString(data,java.base64Decode(key),"AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding",java.base64Decode(iv)))}

<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

var javaImport = new JavaImporter(); javaImport.importPackage( Packages.java.lang, Packages.javax.crypto.spec, Packages.javax.crypto, Packages.java.util ); with(javaImport){ let IV_PARAMETER = String("1ae2c94b"); let ALGORITHM = "DES"; let CIPHER_ALGORITHM = "DES/CBC/PKCS5Padding"; let CHARSET = "utf-8"; let password=String("KK!%G3JdCHJxpAF3%Vg9pN"); function decode(data){ let dks = new DESKeySpec(String(password).getBytes()); let keyFactory = SecretKeyFactory.getInstance("DES"); let secretKey = keyFactory.generateSecret(dks); let cipher = Cipher.getInstance(CIPHER_ALGORITHM); let iv = new IvParameterSpec(IV_PARAMETER.getBytes(CHARSET)); cipher.init(Cipher.DECRYPT_MODE, secretKey, iv); return new String(cipher.doFinal(Base64.getDecoder().decode(String(data).getBytes(CHARSET))), CHARSET); } } //DESËß£ÂØÜÁªìÊùü intro=java.get("intro"); intro=intro!=""?"‚óé"+intro+"‚óé
":""; content=java.getString("$.content",false); saybody=java.getString("$.sayBody",false); say=saybody!=""?"\n‰ΩúËÄÖÊúâËØùËØ¥Ôºö\n"+saybody:""; if(baseUrl.match(/token/)){ result=intro+String(decode(content)+say); }else{result=intro+content+say}

var javaImport = new JavaImporter(); javaImport.importPackage( Packages.java.lang, Packages.javax.crypto.spec, Packages.javax.crypto, Packages.java.util ); with(javaImport){ let IV_PARAMETER = String("1ae2c94b"); let ALGORITHM = "DES"; let CIPHER_ALGORITHM = "DES/CBC/PKCS5Padding"; let CHARSET = "utf-8"; let password=String("KK!%G3JdCHJxpAF3%Vg9pN"); function decode(data){ let dks = new DESKeySpec(String(password).getBytes()); let keyFactory = SecretKeyFactory.getInstance("DES"); let secretKey = keyFactory.generateSecret(dks); let cipher = Cipher.getInstance(CIPHER_ALGORITHM); let iv = new IvParameterSpec(IV_PARAMETER.getBytes(CHARSET)); cipher.init(Cipher.DECRYPT_MODE, secretKey, iv); return new String(cipher.doFinal(Base64.getDecoder().decode(String(data).getBytes(CHARSET))), CHARSET); } } //DESËß£ÂØÜÁªìÊùü intro=java.get("intro"); intro=intro!=""?"["+intro+"]
":""; content=java.getString("$.content"); saybody=java.getString("$.sayBody"); say=saybody!=""?"\n‚óé‰ΩúËÄÖÊúâËØùËØ¥Ôºö\n"+saybody:""; if(baseUrl.match(/token/)){ result=intro+String(decode(content)+say); }else{result=intro+content+say} //Ëé∑ÂèñËØÑËÆ∫ÂºÄÂêØ if(!baseUrl.match(/baidu/)){ //ÂåπÈÖç‰π¶Á±çidË∑üÁ´†ËäÇid bid=baseUrl.match(/novelId=(\d+)/)[1]; cid=baseUrl.match(/chapterId=(\d+)/)[1]; //ÊãºÊé•ËØÑËÆ∫url url="https://s8-static.jjwxc.net/comment_json.php?novelid="+bid+"&chapterid="+cid; //Ëé∑ÂèñËØÑËÆ∫ÂàóË°® list=JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).body; comment=""; //Âà§Êñ≠ËØÑËÆ∫Êï∞Èáè len=list.length>15?15:list.length; for(i=0;i ##‚óé‰ΩúËÄÖÊúâËØùËØ¥Ôºö\s*ÊÑüË∞¢(Âú®|ÊäïÂá∫|ÁÅåÊ∫â|Â∞èÂ§©‰Ωø|.*Êâî‰∫Ü)*.*(Â∞èÂ§©‰Ωø|ËÄÅÊùø|Ëê•ÂÖªÊ∂≤|ÁÅ´ÁÆ≠ÁÇÆ|Âú∞Èõ∑|ÊâãÊ¶¥Âºπ).*|ÊÑüË∞¢(Âú®|ÊäïÂá∫|ÁÅåÊ∫â|Â∞èÂ§©‰Ωø).*?(Â∞èÂ§©‰Ωø|ËÄÅÊùø|Ëê•ÂÖªÊ∂≤).*|ÈùûÂ∏∏ÊÑüË∞¢.*?‰ºöÁªßÁª≠Âä™Âäõ.*|.*?(ÊµÖÊ∞¥ÁÇ∏Âºπ|Ê∑±Ê∞¥È±ºÈõ∑|ÊâãÊ¶¥Âºπ|Âú∞Èõ∑|ÁÅ´ÁÆ≠ÁÇÆ|Êçâ‰∏™Ëô´|ÊôÆÈÄöÁî®Êà∑„ÄÅÂàùÁ∫ß).*|‰∏∫Ëê•ÈÄ†Êõ¥Â•ΩÁöÑËØÑËÆ∫ÁéØÂ¢ÉÔºåËøëÊúüÁΩëÁ´ôË¶ÅÊ±ÇÂèëËØÑÈ°ªËøõË°å.*|Ê≠§ËØÑËÆ∫Ë∂ÖÊó∂Êú™ÂÆ°ÔºåÊöÇË¢´Á≥ªÁªüËá™Âä®Â±èËîΩ.*|Chapter\.\d+

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var text = "";
var mat = result.match(/var chapterContent = "([^"]*?)";/);
if(mat){
text = mat[1];
}
unescape(text.replace(/\\/g,'%'))
</js>

ruleToc.nextTocUrl:
<js>
var pageNum=1;
var mat=src.match(/"total_page":(\d+)/);
if(mat){
pageNum=mat[1];
}
var list = [];
var bid = java.get("bid");
for(var i=2;i<=pageNum;i++){
var body = "bid="+bid+"&page_size=50&page="+i;
var option={"charset": "utf-8","method": "POST","body": String(body)};
var url = "https://book.sina.cn/dpool/newbook/bookv1/ajax/get_catalog.php"+","+JSON.stringify(option);
list.push(url);
}
list
</js>

sb+="Fb0gqLMSf5Android";
list=list.sort();
i=0;
while(i<list.length){
if(i==0){
sb+=list[i]
}else{
    if(list[i].match(/lang-app=/)){  
      i2=i+1;
     i3=i2+1;
     if (list[i2] != null && list[i2].match(/lang=/)) {
                        sb+="&";
                        sb+=list[i2];
                        
                        sb+="&";
                        sb+=list[i];
                        
                        i = i3;
                    }
           }
                sb+="&";
                sb+=list[i];             
      }
i++
}
sb+="AEdDtho2CjiH901aVK7swFqclu6NmzJ4";
return String(java.md5Encode(sb)).toUpperCase()
}

if(baseUrl.match(/jjwxc/)){ var javaImport = new JavaImporter(); javaImport.importPackage( Packages.java.lang, Packages.javax.crypto.spec, Packages.javax.crypto, Packages.java.util ); with(javaImport){ let IV_PARAMETER = String("1ae2c94b"); let ALGORITHM = "DES"; let CIPHER_ALGORITHM = "DES/CBC/PKCS5Padding"; let CHARSET = "utf-8"; let password=String("KK!%G3JdCHJxpAF3%Vg9pN"); function decode(data){ let dks = new DESKeySpec(String(password).getBytes()); let keyFactory = SecretKeyFactory.getInstance("DES"); let secretKey = keyFactory.generateSecret(dks); let cipher = Cipher.getInstance(CIPHER_ALGORITHM); let iv = new IvParameterSpec(IV_PARAMETER.getBytes(CHARSET)); cipher.init(Cipher.DECRYPT_MODE, secretKey, iv); return new String(cipher.doFinal(Base64.getDecoder().decode(String(data).getBytes(CHARSET))), CHARSET); } } //DESËß£ÂØÜÁªìÊùü intro=java.get("intro"); intro=intro!=""?"‚óé"+intro+"‚óé
":""; content=java.getElement("$.content"); saybody=java.getString("$.sayBody"); say=saybody!=""?"\n‰ΩúËÄÖÊúâËØùËØ¥Ôºö\n"+saybody:""; if(baseUrl.match(/token/)){ vipc=/^DcAWGQtI44o=$/.test(content)?JSON.parse(src).message:decode(content) result=intro+String(vipc+say); }else{result=intro+content+say} }else{result="‎"} ##‰∏∫Ëê•ÈÄ†Êõ¥Â•ΩÁöÑËØÑËÆ∫ÁéØÂ¢ÉÔºåËøëÊúüÁΩëÁ´ôË¶ÅÊ±ÇÂèëËØÑÈ°ªËøõË°åÂÆûÂêçËÆ§ËØÅÔºåÊú™ÂÆûÂêçÁî®Êà∑ËØÑËÆ∫ÊöÇÊó∂‰ªÖÂú®ÂØπÂ∫î‰ΩúËÄÖÂêéÂè∞ÂèäÂèëËØÑÁî®Êà∑ÂêéÂè∞ÂèØËßÅ.*|Ëé∑ÂèñÊ≠£ÊñáÂ§±Ë¥•[\s\S]+|‚óé\s+?‚óé

function parse(data){
	let args=data.split(separator);
	let title = args[0],url=args[1],num=nums;
	
	//ÈìæÊé•ÁîüÊàê
	 let u=/^\d+/.test(url)?"http://app-cdn.jjwxc.net/bookstore/getFullPage?channelBody=%7B%"+url+"%22%3A%7B%22offset%22%3A%22{{(page-1)*25}}>%22%2C%22limit%22%3A%2225%22%7D%7D&versionCode=227":url;
 try {num = args[2] }catch(e){}
 try {tag = args[3];
 
 u=tag=="bq‚ôÇ"?'https://android.jjwxc.com/search/getSearchForKeyWords?versionCode=227&offset={{(page-1)*20}}&limit=20&bq='+url+'&removetags=0&fw=0&yc=0&xx=5&sd=0&lx=0&fg=0&mainview=1&fbsj=0&collectionTypes=ors&isfinish=0&sortType=0&token={\{cookie.getKey("https://m.jjwxc.net","sid")}\}':u;
 
 u=tag=="bq‚ôÄ"?'https://android.jjwxc.com/search/getSearchForKeyWords?versionCode=227&offset={{(page-1)*20}}&limit=20&bq='+url+'&removetags=0&fw=0&yc=0&xx=5&sd=0&lx=0&fg=0&mainview=2&fbsj=0&collectionTypes=ors&isfinish=0&sortType=0&token={\{cookie.getKey("https://m.jjwxc.net","sid")}\}':u;
 
 u=tag=="lx‚ôÇ"?'https://android.jjwxc.com/search/getSearchForKeyWords?versionCode=221&offset={{(page-1)*20}}&limit=20&bq=0&removetags=0&fw=0&yc=0&xx=5&sd=0&lx='+url+'&fg=0&mainview=1&fbsj=0&collectionTypes=ors&isfinish=0&sortType=0&token={\{cookie.getKey("https://m.jjwxc.net","sid")}}':u;
 
  u=tag=="lx‚ôÄ"?'https://android.jjwxc.com/search/getSearchForKeyWords?versionCode=221&offset={{(page-1)*20}}&limit=20&bq=0&removetags=0&fw=0&yc=0&xx=5&sd=0&lx='+url+'&fg=0&mainview=2&fbsj=0&collectionTypes=ors&isfinish=0&sortType=0&token={\{cookie.getKey("https://m.jjwxc.net","sid")}}':u
 
 }catch(e){}
	return [title, u, num]
	}

function FlexBox(title, url, num){
		 let obj={};
		 obj.style={},obj.title=title,obj.url=url?url:'',obj.style['layout_flexGrow']=1;
	//Êï∞ÂÄºËÆæÂÆö
	let data={1:1,2:0.4,3:0.25,4:0.2,5:0.15,7:0.1,10:0.05};
obj.style['layout_flexBasisPercent']=data[num]
		return obj
		}
result=JSON.stringify(all.map(data=>{
	let args=parse(data);
	return FlexBox.apply(null, args)
	}))

    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(ÂÖ®Êñá|Â∞èËØ¥|ÂÖçË¥πÈòÖËØª|ÊúÄÊñ∞Á´†ËäÇ).*|[(Ôºà].*[Ôºâ)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/‰∏≠|Â∑≤/, ''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(Ê≠£Êñá|VIPÁ´†ËäÇ|Á´†ËäÇÁõÆÂΩï|ÊúÄÊñ∞Á´†ËäÇ)?(\s+|_)|[\(Ôºà„Äê].*[Ê±ÇÊõ¥Ë∞¢‰πêÂèëÊé®].*/g, '') + ' ‚Ä¢ ' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-'),
	intro: '„ÄÄ„ÄÄüî∏ÊúÄËøëÊõ¥Êñ∞Ôºö' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + og('description').replace(/.*(ËßÇÁúãÂ∞èËØ¥|ÁÆÄ‰ªã)[:Ôºö]|ÂàÜ‰∫´‰π¶Á±ç.*|ÂêÑ‰Ωç‰π¶Âèã.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
url:og('novel:read_url'),
};
book;
</js>
